# Test Generation Skill

> **Source**: `.ai-agents/skills/test-generation.md`

This is a platform adapter for GitHub Copilot.

When this skill is invoked, load and execute the instructions from:
`.ai-agents/skills/test-generation.md`

## Quick Reference

- **Purpose**: Generate test cases and test code
- **Used By**: Tester, Developer
- **Full Documentation**: See source file above
